verbs.description: After [V: threatening] [ARG2: North Korea] [ARG1: with nuclear devastation] [ARGM-TMP: before their summit] , [ARG0: Trump] now claims the U.S. free press is the country 's biggest enemy .
[ARGM-TMP: After threatening North Korea with nuclear devastation before their summit] , [ARG0: Trump] [ARGM-TMP: now] [V: claims] [ARG1: the U.S. free press is the country 's biggest enemy] .
After threatening North Korea with nuclear devastation before their summit , Trump now claims [ARG1: the U.S. free press] [V: is] [ARG2: the country 's biggest enemy] .
